changelog: Cross-device delta sync now uses Mongo server time to prevent clock-drift delays.
Startup settings notification spam is suppressed across devices (including legacy payloads).
Instant sync now sends explicit table ping events so CRUD appears on other devices quickly.
Notification sync deduplication was hardened to avoid repeated processing and UI stalls.
Realtime path now refreshes UI without triggering sync echo loops.
notes_ar: تم تحسين المزامنة الفورية بين الأجهزة: معالجة تأخير اختلاف التوقيت، منع إشعارات إعدادات مزعجة عند التشغيل، وتسريع ظهور عمليات الإضافة/التعديل/الحذف عبر Sync Ping فوري مع ثبات أعلى.
notes_en: Realtime cross-device sync has been stabilized: clock-drift delays fixed, startup settings toast noise removed, and CRUD propagation accelerated with explicit sync pings.
